website_summaries.verdict: The Tritton Kama is a PlayStation-focused gaming headset that happens to work well as a budget smartphone accessory.
cons: Needs an adapter to work as a PC headset

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good Headset
customer_reviews.text: Ive seen people complain about this headset before, however i do not agree with peoples negative views on it. Its a great headset for what your paying. Sound quality through the speakers and the mic is fantastic. My only issue is it is on the ear, i suggest take a break from wearing it after a while so your ears do not get too sore. You can pay more for Astro's etc but to be honest, if your gaming on a budget then this headset is your best bet!
customer_reviews.author: Paul F

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and lots of feedback
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is decent enough but after a while I started to give lots of feedback to people I talk with. I dont know if this was a result of the headset taking a knock or if its just the mic/speakers are just cheap but, people moaned so much Ive all but been forced in to buying a new headset (which will be TB's) Cushions are small too so hurt your ears after a long stint of gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. R. Veldeman

customer_reviews.title: Great For Xbox One Users
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to game as a person would do. Quality built no problems yet. Great surround sound for the in depth gaming eg: loud bangs etcc. Works with Xbox one as it says comes with there own adapter and you just plug In and play. Only problem for me is that they hurt a little round the ears because I wear glasses and the back of them dig in
customer_reviews.author: Chris Birkbeck

customer_reviews.title: Good headset.
customer_reviews.text: Small but sleek little headset. Comes with it's own adapter which can be used on other headsets if ever needed. Only issue we have with this headset is that other people in Xbox party chat get a really bad echo from it when we speak using it. Not sure if that's a fault of the headset or the ever erratic Xbox though.
customer_reviews.author: Lee246

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Headset
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning headset, comes with a volume controller and adapter for first generation Xbox controllers which is useful to maintain quality and balance for the sound. The microphone is very clear on the other side to allow for good communication to be made when it's needed under competitive gaming situations.
customer_reviews.author: Chae Taylor

customer_reviews.title: No batteries required, yet cordless
customer_reviews.text: No batteries required, yet cordless. Just plug the headset into the remote control and it draws power from the remote control. Fantastic product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: Coldplay

customer_reviews.title: They do the job!
customer_reviews.text: These were a replacement for the official Xbox one headset that went wrong twice! My son had had these 3 months, so far so good, used nearly everyday, comfortable and they are still working!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product was bought for my son's Xbox ..great product
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Sounds fine (for the price). Cheaper and better alternative to the xbox headset.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Headset is uncomfortable but the sound is OK, it does what it says however wouldn't purchase had known
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ricketts

customer_reviews.title: wonderful present
customer_reviews.text: i purchased these headphones for my grandson and he is over the moon with them. would recommend .

customer_reviews.title: Tritton Kama stereo headset
customer_reviews.text: The Headphones met my expatations id bought them for my son and he loves them :) x

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best ones my son has had, and he has had quite a few. very comfortable and steady

customer_reviews.title: They worked for a month then stopped producing sound and ...
customer_reviews.text: They worked for a month then stopped producing sound and the microphone stopped working. Hurts the ears after a couple of hours of use.

customer_reviews.title: its works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: had it for a year now, its works like a charm, just one bad thing about it. if you have it on full blast in ur ears the sound goes to the mic creating an echo on xbox live party chat.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant...worth the pennies!!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant...very comfy to wear, even with my glasses...and the sound quality is crystal clear. Would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones but only lasted 3 months before lead became loose and sound intermittent, poor quality end auxiliary lead

customer_reviews.text: 10/10, perfect quality, comfortable, for the price they're brilliant and very easy to understand how they work

customer_reviews.text: Did not come with adaptor to plug into handset, very disappointed . Unable to use without.!!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, met all expectations, works for PC, but not too good for long gaming periods as it gets uncomfortable. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Not happy to be honest the mic echoes and madcatz have really poor customer service !

customer_reviews.text: Broken very easily within a short period of time I wouldn't recommend this microphone at all cost me £40 I will be complaining.

customer_reviews.title: Turn up on time good quality kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Turn up on time good quality kids love them.Very comfortable look good

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Little uncomfortable on the ears but overall great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Rudi

customer_reviews.title: pretty good headphones for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This comes with an unofficial Xbox one headphone adapter which for an official adapter on its own can cost around £20. And most other gaming headphones I've looked at do not come with one. So I'm pleased with the over all cost. I've owned other tritton headphones for the 360 and these don't disappoint. The ear cups are small, they sit on the ears comfortably with lots of padding. Sound is just OK I've had better. Playing battlefield 4 is great Im able to pinpoint where I'm being shot from with these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Foxdie

customer_reviews.title: not great all for a seat of headphones for this price
customer_reviews.text: Only giving one star as that's the minimum - Bought these in Feb 2015 and as of April 2015 the Amazon systems says they are not ellible for a return despite the fact that they have broken already, not great all for a seat of headphones for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones, sound is grea, they look great, and their comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... are the same size as your thumbs) and feel horrible. Never had a headset with pads made of ...
customer_reviews.text: Earpieces are way too small (unless your ears are the same size as your thumbs) and feel horrible. Never had a headset with pads made of this material, but i wouldnt want one as it feels uncomfortable while squashing my ears. Not experienced anything else with this headset because I don't want to put it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Iain W

customer_reviews.title: whats wrong?
customer_reviews.text: thought theses were brilliant up until two days ago, but all of a sudden I cannot hear my friends on line but they can hear me and I can hear game sound.
customer_reviews.author: cupcakes26

customer_reviews.title: This microphone is very poor coming from a decent company
customer_reviews.text: This microphone is very poor coming from a decent company. This is the first time I have bought headphones from Tritton after using predominately Turtle Beach headphones. The ear pads will eventually hurt my ears after around an hours play so long time gaming is annoying and painful. My friends also seem to hear an echo whenever I join an Xbox live party. Overall the headphones are a poor quality and was honestly expecting better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sound, not so great comfort
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this headset I already knew from reviews the comfort wasn't great. But, to overcome this minor problem I suggest wearing a beanie or something to completely eradicate discomfort. And once you do this you can enjoy long gaming sessions without sore, red ears. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Sudden random break
customer_reviews.text: Well it worked fine for a while, then suddenly out of the blue just stopped me from speaking, I'm not sure what happened but I took good care of it, now it's just completely useless and I just let it lay there, useless don't get!!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Delivers the promise!
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it promises. Ability to change between listening to game sound and party chat is great, and they are comfortable for long gaming sessions!
customer_reviews.author: Adam H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound for the price easy update to controller for ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound for the price easy update to controller for headphones to work, nice size ear padding a bit too small but nothing to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Broken within a month
customer_reviews.text: Within a month of ordering it has broken already I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work and I had someone in PC World look ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work and I had someone in PC World look at it and they told me that it shouldn't of been sent out to me the first place
customer_reviews.author: Colm Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: The mic is very uncomfortable, and began to hurt my ears after about 1 hour of game play. My friends hear an echo through the Xbox live party when I join. Overall awful quality would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Gm

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband - he previously had a Tritton headset for the Xbox 360 but it is not compatible with the Xbox One hence the purchase of these. The headset is nice, the only issue is with the mouthpiece - would have preferred it to have rotatable instead of just twisty to get it out of the way when not in use. The bits that go over the ear are smaller than his previous ones, however that has not been a big deal as he has quite small ears anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: ... anyone yet so not sure what the mic is like but sound is very good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't spoken to anyone yet so not sure what the mic is like but sound is very good

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: controller adapter broke within the first month of use would not buy trittons again

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came fast very good but prefer headphone that cup your ears thought that's what theese would be
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Laing

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, broke on arrival.. Had to tighten two loose screws.. Wouldn't recommend.

customer_reviews.text: No star sending my back as not happy with then mate are say they can not here me and sound like they are hear they self talk back too

product_meta.title: Tritton Kama Stereo Headset - Black [Xbox One + Nintendo Switch]
product_meta.description:
TRITTON KAMA STEREO HEADSET FOR XBOX ONE
LIGHTWEIGHT COMFORT FOR MARATHON GAMING
Built for the Xbox One console's multiplayer online environments, TRITTON's officially licensed Kama Stereo Headset delivers unbeatable performance, comfort, and value. Directly connecting to the Xbox One wireless controller through the included headset adapter – and nearly any device with a 3.5mm jack – you're free to play in full stereo no matter where the game takes you.

UNCOMPLICATED AUDIO CONTROLS
The included Xbox One Stereo Headset Adapter enables quick adjustments to voices heard through the precision-balanced 40mm speakers. Change the volume, mute the mic and fine-tune the game/chat balance, all without taking your hands off the controller.

INTUITIVE PLUG-AND-PLAY CONNECTIVITY
Preparing the Kama for stereo audio is very straightforward. Simply plug the 3.5mm cable into your controller via the included adapter to finish the connection process.

CREATED FOR XBOX LIVE CHAT AND PARTY CHAT
Whether your game of choice is Titanfall, Forza Motorsport 5, or Killer Instinct, the Kama will transform your online Xbox One gaming experience by opening up the lines of communication with remote gamers. Courtesy of Party Chat for Xbox One, you can use the Kama to converse with up to seven other players.

AT HOME, WORK, OR ON THE MOVE
Your video games, music and other media can travel everywhere with you. Not limited to the Xbox One console, the Kama is also compatible with portable gaming systems, nearly all tablets and smartphones, plus most laptops and notebooks.

ERGONOMICALLY DESIGNED FOR EXTREME COMFORT
Headset comfort is of utmost importance during extended gaming sessions. The Kama keeps your ears comfy with its padded, adjustable headrail, which extends an extra 1.25 inches on either side to accommodate a wide range of head sizes. When it's time for a break from the action, the soft earcups swivel to provide a comfortable around-the-neck resting position.

DURABLE AND FLEXIBLE PERFORMANCE MIC
Fixed microphones may not always properly align with your mouth, resulting in decreased sound quality when communicating over Xbox Live. Problem solved with the Kama's flexible solution – it provides the freedom to bend the mic into a position that's optimal for picking up your voice.

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS:
 * Cable Length: 3.3ft/1m
 * Speaker Diameter: 40mm
 * Magnet Type: Neodymium
 * Frequency Response: 20Hz-20kHz
 * Total Harmonic Distortion (THD): <1%
 * Resistance: 16 ohms
 * Audio Input Type: 3.5mm Connector



BOX CONTAINS
1 x Kama Stereo Headset with Flexible Microphone
1 x Xbox One Stereo Headset Adapter
feature_bullets: Lightweight comfort for marathon gaming sessions
Compatible with a wide variety of platforms: Xbox One, Xbox 360, Nintendo Switch, Wii U, 3DS, PS4, PS3, Windows PC, Mac, Smart phones and most devices employing 3.5mm output
